name: hard coal preparation plant construction | hard coal preparation plant | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18494/documentation

"This activity describes the infrastructure required for the preparation (screening, crushing, washing etc.) of run-of-mine (R.O.M) hard coal. Data for land use is based on information from specific plants. Material requirements are based on generic estimates. ;The average annual capacity of coal washeries (for thermal coal) of 4.38 million metric tonnes is based on information from 9 plants. The average lifetime of the plants is estimated to be 30 years.

Includes the area of the infrastructure (buildings, paved roads, etc.), the machines and buildings used for the hard coal preperation. Energy requirements for the construction as well as end of life treatment of buildings and industrial machinery are accounted for in the respective upstream activities (building construction multi-storey/hall, industrial machine construction).

Does not include the operation of the plant.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data of plants operational in 2007/2008 are used in this dataset. With an average life time of 30 years it can be assumed that this represent the current technology level at least until 2020.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for land use and plant capacity are based on Indian reports. Material input data is based on generic estimates.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The datasets represtents an average hard coal preperation plant, as operational in India in 2007/2008. Reference(s): Ministry of Environment & Forests, Government of India. 2010. Environmental Impact Assessment Guidance Manual for Coal Washeries. Online from http://envfor.nic.in/sites/default/files/Coal%20washeries_may-10_0.pdf, September 8, 2017
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data are partially based on information specific to the Indian context (land use, capacity) and assumed representative also for the global dataset.

exchanges.description: Based on data for occupied area from two EIA reports for coal washery plant projects in India (6.075ha with capacity of 5Mt/a and 7.35ha with capacity of 4.8Mt/a. It is assumed that land use for this type of plants is similar across geographies. No information available on the lifetime of the plants. An estimation had to be made to calculate the specific land transformation. A lifetime of the plant of 30 years can be assumed.

Based on data for occupied area from two EIA reports for coal washery plant projects in India (6.075ha with capacity of 5Mt/a and 7.35ha with capacity of 4.8Mt/a. It is assumed that land use for this type of plants is similar across geographies. No information available on the lifetime of the plants. An estimation had to be made to calculate the specific land transformation. A lifetime of the plant of 30 years can be assumed. 
Reference(s): 
Min Mec Consultancy Pvt. Ltd. (2008). Executive summary of rapid environmental impact assessment and environmental management plan for Binjhri Washery expansion plant at Korba, Chattisgharh
Chattisgharh Environmental Conservation Board (n.d.) Executive Summary. Rapid Environmental Impact Assessment for Proposal of Coal Washery Plant at Jhaber, Tahsil Dipka, Korba (CG)

Based on data for occupied area from two EIA reports for coal washery plant projects in India (6.075ha with capacity of 5Mt/a and 7.35ha with capacity of 4.8Mt/a. It is assumed that land use for this type of plants is similar across geographies.  Reference(s): 
Min Mec Consultancy Pvt. Ltd. (2008). Executive summary of rapid environmental impact assessment and environmental management plan for Binjhri Washery expansion plant at Korba, Chattisgharh
Chattisgharh Environmental Conservation Board (n.d.) Executive Summary. Rapid Environmental Impact Assessment for Proposal of Coal Washery Plant at Jhaber, Tahsil Dipka, Korba (CG)
